messages.content: Don't make assumptions about what values to plug into functions. Ask for clarification if a user request is ambiguous.
How far am I from the Golden Gate Bridge

Sure— to calculate the distance, I need your current location. Could you please tell me your latitude and longitude? Once I have those, I can compute how far you are from the Golden Gate Bridge (which sits at about 37.8199 N, 122.4783 W).
I don't have that info right now.

No problem. If you can’t pull your exact lat/long, could you instead tell me:

• Your current address, city or ZIP code  
• Or even just the nearest town or landmark

With that I can estimate your coordinates and then compute the distance to the Golden Gate Bridge for you.
I don't have any of that info either.

I’m unable to compute a distance without at least an approximate location for you. Could you please provide any of the following?

• Your city or ZIP/postal code  
• The name of the town or region you’re in  
• A nearby landmark or major intersection  

With any one of those, I can look up your coordinates and then calculate how far you are from the Golden Gate Bridge.
I really don't have location info at all.

I’m afraid I can’t compute a meaningful distance without at least an approximate location. Here are a couple of easy ways you can grab your latitude/longitude or share your location:

1. On a smartphone:  
   • Open Google Maps (or Apple Maps)  
   • Tap the “blue dot” indicating your location  
   • Your latitude/longitude will pop up—just copy and paste those numbers here.

2. In a web browser:  
   • Go to “https://www.google.com/maps”  
   • Click the “My location” (target) icon  
   • Right-click the blue dot and choose “What’s here?”  
   • Google will display your lat/long at the bottom.

3. If you’d rather give a rough address, city name or ZIP/postal code instead, that works too.

Once you have either:  
• Your latitude & longitude OR  
• A street address, city or ZIP code  

…let me know, and I’ll calculate the distance from you to the Golden Gate Bridge right away.
